entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is introduced as the leader who enters the Great Hall with a stool and an ancient wizard's hat. She places the stool in front of the first years and stands back.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as recalling his own experience of standing in front of the staff table waiting for the Sorting Hat to determine which House he belonged to.

entities.name: sorting hat
entities.description: The Sorting Hat is introduced as an ancient wizard's hat that bursts into song when its rip near the brim opens wide.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned as a noble school founded by its founders who thought they would never be parted.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall carries the Sorting Hat on a stool in front of the first years.
Harry attended Hogwarts and was waiting for the Sorting Hat to determine which House he belonged to.
